Title: Azure Edge Extensions AIO ISA-95 LNM and MQ
Summary: This is a solution to build an ISA-95 network model on top of Azure IoT Operations utilizing AIO LNM and AIO MQ.
Description: This repository defines two level of an ISA-95 network model and enables MQTT bridging between the layers for bidirectional communication. This sample also showcases how to implement a Kafka Connector to retrieve data from a cloud-based Kafka Broker
